> *This release enhances documentation and automated tools, and introduces new block manipulation features.*

Bookshelf is now based on **Minecraft 1.21**.


- ğŸ“ **[#206](https://github.com/mcbookshelf/Bookshelf/issues/206)** - Added new related datapacks and mods.
- ğŸ“ **[#200](https://github.com/mcbookshelf/Bookshelf/issues/200)** - Replaced the old function header with a new license-only header, now mandatory for all functions. Metadata has been moved to the feature function tag.
- ğŸ“ **[#52](https://github.com/mcbookshelf/Bookshelf/issues/52)** / **[#175](https://github.com/mcbookshelf/Bookshelf/issues/175)** - Each module now includes its own manual metadata, aiding in dependency management and supporting tools like the upcoming Bookshelf Manager. More info [here](project:contribute/metadata.md).
- âš™ï¸ **[#199](https://github.com/mcbookshelf/Bookshelf/pull/199)** - Automated metadata verification during pull requests to ensure no data is missed. More info [here](project:contribute/contribution-validation.md).
- âš™ï¸ Added templates for pull requests and issues.
